page.title: 10ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: About fifteen of our school went with ten other schools to Sackville School to give a concert.There were about 200 children altogether.The festival was conducted by our music teacher.As well as singing the children played violins,recorders and flutes and a teacher played an accordion. We had all learned "Captain and His Floating Zoo", "The Keeper", "Singing the Blues" and "The Keeper".Some schools had also prepared pieces of their own to perform. We called ourselves "The Fraying Pockets" and sang "Only You".
